description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take part in a tense penalty shootout with your avatar. Compete against AI or take on a friend and see if you can become the penalty shootout master! Quick fire fun for all the family.
